articles.Title: Let's stop telling celebrities to stay out of politics
articles.Author: Analysis by Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.Description: When someone complains that celebrities should stay out of politics, Lisa Respers France wonders if they have forgotten the United States has had a former actor -- and now an ex-reality star -- serve as President. Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson spoke out this week.

articles.Title: Kansas could do something in November it hasn't done in almost 100 years
articles.Author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.Description: The last time Kansas sent a Democrat to the US Senate, the kidnapping of the Lindbergh baby was all over the news. "Tarzan the Ape Man" was a hit movie. And Franklin Delano Roosevelt won his first term, crushing incumbent Herbert Hoover.
